Bilālidāyaka Thera：1．Bilālidāyaka Thera． An arahant．In the time of Padumuttara Buddha he was an ascetic in the Himālaya and offered the Buddha some bilāli tubers．Fifty four kappas ago he was a king called Sumekhali （Ap．i．145） （v．l．Sumelaya）．He is probably identical with Kosalavihārī Thera．ThagA．i．134f．

2．Bilālidāyaka Thera．An arahant．Fifty four kappas ago he gave some bilāli tubers to a recluse at the foot of the mountain Romasa．Ap．i．232．
